sentences.sContent: A thin layer of gold or something simulating gold that is applied in gilding.
sentences.sContent_eng: A thin layer of gold or something simulating gold that is applied in gilding.
sentences.sCn: 镀金，包金一层薄的涂金层或其适用于镀金的仿金物。

words.tran: 镀金；小母猪；眩目的外表
镀金（gild的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 镀金； 贴金层， 镀金层； 金色涂层
trans.tranOther: Gilding is a layer of gold or gold paint that is put on something
